entry.title: New release for Git-Sync: v0.6.0
entry.content:
Bitbucket Support

git-sync now support backing up repositories from Bitbucket as well! ðŸŽ‰

Changelog

  • d187441c1d107ffda26a6807acbb95e7dbf684d0 build(deps): :arrow_up: upgraded go to 1.22.5
  • a02cc378ca923931a419bfe068f055c02dc90a94 chore(deps): update golang docker tag to v1.22.5

  • 848b08b032d1a690f21b8232f454ce6e7fea746e chore: :truck: refactor func name
  • 55bb566c89ec66f30a8714f053fed6ff35405f3c feat: :sparkles: bitbucket support added

entry.title: New release for Git-Sync: v0.7.0
entry.content:
What's New!

With this release, now we have a new CLI flag called cron. With this now you don't need to set up cronjob directly on your system (you still can, no one is stopping you) but with the new flag you can set up cronjobs more seamlessly. More details about this is added on the Wiki Page

Changelog

  • 913b64bfa793d6696b9a03123654ce7768cce5f9 chore: :wrench: remove append mode from goreleaser config
  • 7299582c472bfa5a6698b4c7e8f91a6aa4d38f81 feat: :sparkles: add support for setting up cron job via new arg "cron"
  • cae4fe57a8fb307441c3609e9f7953379fade079 feat: :sparkles: allow setting up cron expression from config file as well
